# Julien Simon - AI Operating Partner

> Julien Simon is an AI Operating Partner at Fortino Capital with 30+ years of technology leadership. Expert in Small Language Models, enterprise AI implementation, and bridging AI research with practical business applications. #1 AI Evangelist globally (AI Magazine 2021). 684+ speaking engagements across 37 countries, 467K+ YouTube subscribers, 409+ technical articles. Author of "Learn Amazon SageMaker" (Packt Publishing). Previously VP & Chief Evangelist at Arcee AI, Chief Evangelist at Hugging Face, and Global Evangelist for AI/ML at AWS.

Last updated: 2026-02-26

## Key Facts

- Current role: AI Operating Partner at Fortino Capital (PE & VC)
- 684+ speaking engagements across 37 countries and 95 cities
- 467K+ YouTube subscribers, 449+ videos
- 409+ technical blog posts across AWS, Hugging Face, Medium, Arcee AI, and Substack
- Author of "Learn Amazon SageMaker" (Packt Publishing, 2 editions)
- #1 AI Evangelist globally (AI Magazine 2021)
- Featured in "The 100 Shaping AI in Europe" (L'Opinion & Oliver Wyman, 2025)
- Arm Ambassador (2025)
- 30+ years technology leadership

## Primary Expertise

- Small Language Models (SLMs) — cost-effective, privacy-first enterprise AI
- Enterprise AI Implementation — practical deployment strategies for production
- Private Equity AI Strategy — portfolio company acceleration
- Cloud Computing — AWS (10 certifications), infrastructure optimization
- Open Source AI — Hugging Face ecosystem, open-weights models
- AI Hardware — inference optimization across CPU, GPU, and AI accelerators

## Pages

- [Homepage](https://www.julien.org): Professional profile, expertise areas, and contact information
- [Experience](https://www.julien.org/experience): 30+ years of career history from Apple to AWS to Hugging Face to Fortino Capital
- [Speaking](https://www.julien.org/speaking): 684+ talks at AWS re:Invent, KubeCon, World Bank, UNESCO, NY Federal Reserve, and more
- [Publications](https://www.julien.org/publications): 409+ technical articles across AWS, Hugging Face, Medium, Arcee AI, and Substack
- [YouTube Videos](https://www.julien.org/youtube-videos): 467K+ subscribers, AI/ML tutorials, demos, and deep-dives
- [Books](https://www.julien.org/books): "Learn Amazon SageMaker" and other technical publications
- [Code & Projects](https://www.julien.org/code): Open source projects and GitHub repositories

## Blog Categories

- [Industry Perspectives](https://www.julien.org/blog/industry-perspectives/index.html): Company-agnostic AI industry analysis (2021–present)
- [The AI Realist (Substack)](https://www.airealist.ai/): Weekly newsletter on AI strategy and industry trends
- [AWS Blog Posts](https://www.julien.org/blog-posts/aws): 68+ articles on SageMaker, AI/ML services (2015–2021)
- [Hugging Face Blog Posts](https://www.julien.org/blog-posts/huggingface): 23+ articles on transformers, NLP, model optimization (2021–2024)
- [Arcee AI Blog Posts](https://www.julien.org/blog-posts/arcee): 16+ articles on Small Language Models, model merging (2024–2025)
- [Medium Articles](https://www.julien.org/blog-posts/aws-medium): 182+ technical deep-dives and industry analysis (2015–2021)
